description.purpose: Identify pneumonia on a chest X-ray and assess for complications

ticket:
IMAGE: IMG001 (PA chest X-ray)
PATIENT: PAT_IMG001 (58M, diabetic, former smoker)
QUESTION: What abnormality is seen in the right lower zone of this chest X-ray? Are there any associated findings?
correct_answer: Right lower lobe consolidation consistent with pneumonia

actions.name: analyze_medical_image
actions.info: Analyze the chest X-ray for abnormalities

arguments.answer: Right lower lobe consolidation consistent with pneumonia

nl_assertions: The agent identified consolidation in the right lower lobe
The agent mentioned pneumonia as the diagnosis
The agent noted the pleural effusion as an associated finding
The agent reviewed patient context before making diagnosis

description.purpose: Identify multiple sclerosis on brain MRI

ticket:
IMAGE: IMG007 (T2-weighted axial brain MRI)
PATIENT: PAT_IMG007 (35F, prior optic neuritis, new visual disturbances)
QUESTION: What pattern of white matter lesions is seen? What is the most likely diagnosis?
correct_answer: Dawson's fingers - periventricular lesions oriented perpendicular to the ventricles

actions.name: analyze_medical_image
actions.info: Analyze brain MRI for white matter lesions

actions.name: get_patient_context
actions.info: Review history of prior optic neuritis

actions.name: submit_answer

arguments.answer: Dawson's fingers - periventricular lesions oriented perpendicular to the ventricles

actions.info: Identify Dawson's fingers and diagnose MS

nl_assertions: The agent identified Dawson's fingers pattern
The agent mentioned multiple sclerosis as the diagnosis
The agent noted periventricular distribution
The agent considered prior optic neuritis as supporting dissemination in time
